concept.title: Assign a Draw Order to a Hatch
concept.shortdesc: The draw order of hatching and boundaries can be controlled so as to view and select more easily. When creating hatch patterns, you can specify the draw order of the patterns to decide to hatch before or after the boundaries or set it in front or at the backof all objects. The value will be stored in systemvariable HPDRAWORDER.

conbody.p: Other settings of hatch pattern may not be influenced regardless of changing the draw order of hatch pattern.
